decks.notes: The deck focuses on utilizing Amulet of Vigor to untap lands and generate mana quickly, allowing for explosive plays with Primeval Titan and Scapeshift to search for and play Valakut, the Molten Pinnacle. This combo can deal massive amounts of damage in a single turn, overwhelming opponents. The deck also includes cards like Urza's Saga and Green Sun's Zenith to search for key pieces and ensure consistency in executing the combo. By carefully managing land drops and utilizing cards like Arboreal Grazer and Simic Growth Chamber, the deck aims to ramp up quickly and overwhelm opponents with its powerful combo potential.

The focus of this deck is to utilize cheap spells and creatures to quickly deal damage to the opponent, aiming to win the game swiftly before the opponent can mount a defense. By utilizing cards like Dragon's Rage Channeler and Monastery Swiftspear alongside pump spells like Mutagenic Growth and Violent Urge, this deck aims to outpace the opponent in terms of aggression. The inclusion of cards like Mishra's Bauble and Expressive Iteration also helps to maintain card advantage and ensure a consistent stream of threats to keep the pressure on the opponent.

This deck focuses on quickly overwhelming the opponent with a swarm of cheap and efficient artifact creatures, fueled by cards like Mox Opal and Urza's Saga. It aims to establish a board presence early on and maintain pressure with aggressive attacks while disrupting the opponent's game plan with cards like Metallic Rebuke and Sink into Stupor. The deck also utilizes various artifacts and equipment to provide additional utility and flexibility in different situations, ultimately seeking to outpace and outmaneuver the opponent to secure a decisive victory.

The key concept of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures and disruptive spells. By utilizing cards like Thoughtseize and Terminate to disrupt the opponent's game plan, alongside efficient creatures like Ragavan and Seasoned Pyromancer, the goal is to put constant pressure on the opponent and close out the game quickly. Additionally, cards like Mishra's Bauble and Faithless Looting help to filter through the deck and find key pieces while the mana base allows for quick and efficient casting of spells.

The main concept of this deck is to disrupt the opponent's game plan while gradually building up a board presence with aggressive creatures. The deck uses disruptive elements like Teferi, Time Raveler and Consign to Memory to control the pace of the game, while also utilizing cards like Ephemerate and Solitude to protect key creatures. The deck aims to apply pressure with its creatures like White Orchid Phantom and Starfield Shepherd, and eventually overwhelm the opponent with a combination of aggressive creatures and disruption spells. Additionally, the deck includes cards like Guide of Souls and Quantum Riddler to provide additional support and utility to the strategy.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly fill the graveyard with cards like Blazing Rootwalla, Detective's Phoenix, and Vengevine in order to bring out powerful creatures like Hollow One and Marauding Mako for aggressive early game plays. Utilizing cards like Burning Inquiry and Faithless Looting to cycle through the deck quickly, combined with cards like Street Wraith and Flameblade Adept for additional damage. The deck also includes cards like Fear of Missing Out and Ox of Agonas for additional value and staying power in longer games.

The deck revolves around using artifacts to quickly ramp up and overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures. By utilizing cards like Mishra's Bauble and Mox Opal, the deck can quickly deploy threats such as Kappa Cannoneer and Pinnacle Emissary. Emry, Lurker of the Loch helps to recur key artifacts, while Thought Monitor provides card advantage. Engineered Explosives and Tormod's Crypt can deal with opposing threats, while Urza's Saga helps to tutor for crucial artifacts. The deck also includes disruption with cards like Metallic Rebuke and Sink into Stupor. With a focus on artifacts and quick aggression, this deck aims to take control of the battlefield early on and close out the game swiftly.

This deck focuses on quickly building up a board presence with low-cost aggressive creatures and spells to overwhelm the opponent. By playing efficiently and utilizing cards like Dragon's Rage Channeler and Monastery Swiftspear, the goal is to deal damage quickly and efficiently while maintaining card advantage with cards like Mishra's Bauble and Expressive Iteration. With a mix of burn spells like Lightning Bolt and combat tricks like Mutagenic Growth, this deck aims to outpace the opponent and secure a victory before they can stabilize.

The deck revolves around using creature toolbox cards like Cauldron Familiar and Gilded Goose to generate value while setting up a combo win condition with cards like Marionette Apprentice. Samwise Gamgee acts as a key piece in the combo, while cards like Viscera Seer help facilitate the combo by sacrificing creatures. The deck also includes support cards like Chord of Calling and Birthing Ritual to help find and cast key pieces. The inclusion of powerful creatures like Yawgmoth, Thran Physician and Sephiroth, Fabled SOLDIER provide additional utility and options for the player.

This deck focuses on ramping up mana quickly using cards like Utopia Sprawl and Eldrazi Temple, in order to cast powerful Eldrazi creatures like Emrakul, the Promised End and World Breaker. The deck also utilizes control elements such as Malevolent Rumble and Kozilek's Command to disrupt the opponent's strategy. Key cards like Sowing Mycospawn and Kozilek's Return provide additional ways to control the board and maintain dominance. By combining ramp and control elements, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with massive Eldrazi threats while disrupting their game plan.

The deck aims to control the game by ramping up mana quickly with Eldrazi creatures and various spells. It utilizes cards like Sowing Mycospawn and Ugin's Labyrinth to slow down opponent's strategies, while also having powerful threats like Emrakul, the Promised End and World Breaker to finish off games. The deck features a mix of ramp, removal, and disruption to keep opponents on the back foot while steadily building towards overwhelming Eldrazi threats. It seeks to dominate the late game with its powerful creatures and versatile spells.

The deck focuses on quickly filling the graveyard with creatures like Atraxa, Grand Unifier and Griselbrand, then using Goryo's Vengeance and Ephemerate to reanimate them for powerful combos and value. Cards like Faithful Mending and Psychic Frog help with card selection and manipulation, while Solitude and Subtlety provide removal and protection. The deck also includes a suite of disruptive spells like Force of Negation and Thoughtseize to disrupt the opponent's game plan. The mana base is carefully constructed to support the deck's requirements and allow for consistent casting of spells.

This Aggro-Affinity deck focuses on quickly deploying artifacts to build a wide board presence and overwhelm the opponent with quick attacks. The key strategy is to efficiently cast and utilize cheap artifacts like Mishra's Bauble and Mox Opal to enable powerful cards such as Urza's Saga and Thoughtcast. Engineered Explosives and Metallic Rebuke provide disruption and removal options, while Pinnacle Emissary and Kappa Cannoneer offer additional aggression. The inclusion of cards like Tormod's Crypt and Shadowspear helps to address graveyards and provide additional utility in different matchups.

The deck focuses on quickly ramping up artifacts to gain significant advantage while disrupting opponents with counterspells and removal. It aims to overwhelm opponents with its fast-paced plays and efficient creatures while using Urza's Saga to tutor for essential artifacts. The deck employs a mix of aggressive threats and disruptive elements to control the board and maintain pressure on the opponent. By carefully managing resources and leveraging the power of artifacts, the deck can quickly close out games and outmaneuver opponents in the Modern format.

The deck focuses on utilizing the UrzaTron lands to quickly assemble the Urza lands for massive mana generation to play big Eldrazi threats. It also includes disruptive elements like Thought-Knot Seer and Trinisphere to control the opponent's resources and counter their game plan. Karn, the Great Creator and Ugin, the Eye of the Storms provide additional utility and threats. The deck aims to overwhelm opponents with powerful threats and disruption while using the Tron lands for a huge advantage in mana production.

The deck focuses on controlling the board by using powerful Eldrazi creatures and spells to disrupt the opponent's strategy. By ramping up with Urza lands and Expedition Map, you can quickly get to your game-changing threats like Karn, the Great Creator and Ugin, the Eye of the Storms. The deck also includes removal spells like Dismember and Kozilek's Command to deal with threats, while also utilizing Relic of Progenitus to disrupt graveyard strategies. The goal is to establish board control and overwhelm the opponent with your powerful Eldrazi creatures.
